reporter_caption.center: AMERICAN LIFE ACCIDENT INSURANCE v. BOATWRIGHT, 339 S.W.2d 468 (Ky. 1960)

caption.center: AMERICAN LIFE ACCIDENT INSURANCE CO. OF KENTUCKY, Appellant, v. Lucy

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Garrard County; K.S. Alcorn, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Wallace, Turner Reed, Lexington, Delbert Eagle, Lancaster, for appellant.
Edward P. Roark, Lancaster, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Motion for an appeal from a judgment of the Garrard Circuit Court, Hon. K.S. Alcorn, Judge, on an insurance policy for $1,060.
Upon consideration, the court is of the opinion that the judgment is correct. The motion for an appeal is overruled, and the judgment stands
Affirmed.
